text: Which device in a room can print out material and put hard copies of documents in the hands of viewers?
What object in a room is capable of producing hard copies of documents, thereby providing viewers with a physical copy of the material?
What is the name of the device can generate and print material, offering hard copies of documents for viewers in a room?
In a room, what object can be used to produce hard copies (prints) of documents, thereby making them tangible and easily accessible to viewers?
What device can be found in a room that can produce hard copies of documents and provide viewers with a physical printout?
What device found within a room is designed to print out materials and provide hard copies of documents to viewers?
